title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your past may suddenly reappear in front of your eyes. Perhaps an email or letter shuttles you down Memory Lane, triggering a wellspring of emotions. A correspondence could remind you of sweet, nostalgic thoughts, inspiring you to reach out to a loved one from those days. However, its also possible to become saddened by your recollections. The intensity of your thoughts could throw your day for a loop. However, you neednt bottle up your feelings once they surge forth. Instead, be grateful for the memories and how the experiences fueled your growth into the person you are today. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
